if you're going to show them to someone, try http://paste.ubuntu.com
there might be some things in /var/log
most log files are kept in /var/log
each of the files there contains logs
it depends on which errors you want to look for
dpkg.log and the other files named like it contain the logs of installed/removed packages
you may also want to check auth.log
that contains commands run with sudo
a .bin runs itself in most cases
